SELECT MENU_NO, MENU_NAME, MENU_PRICE, MENU_CATEGORY FROM MENU_STATUS LEFT JOIN MENU USING(MENU_NO) WHERE CINEMA_NO = (SELECT CINEMA_NO FROM CINEMA WHERE CINEMA_NAME LIKE #{cinemaName})

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROUND(AVG(MENU_GRADE),1) AS MENU_GRADE , MENU_NAME , MENU_CATEGORY , MENU_PRICE, MENU_IMG FROM MENU_RECOMMEND LEFT JOIN MENU_STATUS USING(SNACK_CINEMA_NO) LEFT JOIN MENU USING(MENU_NO) WHERE SNACK_CINEMA_NO IN (SELECT SNACK_CINEMA_NO FROM MENU_STATUS WHERE CINEMA_NO = (SELECT CINEMA_NO FROM CINEMA WHERE CINEMA_NAME LIKE #{cinemaName})) AND MENU_CATEGORY = '팝콘' GROUP BY SNACK_CINEMA_NO, MENU_NAME, MENU_CATEGORY,MENU_PRICE, MENU_IMG ORDER BY MENU_GRADE DESC, MENU_NAME) WHERE ROWNUM =1
